mapper.select: SELECT A.COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_TEXT FROM FCM0008M A JOIN SYS0105M B ON A.COST_CENTER = B.COST_CENTER RIGHT JOIN ORG0001D C ON (C.MAIN_DEPT = B.MAIN_DEPT_CODE AND C.SUB_DEPT = B.SUB_DEPT_CODE) OR (C.MAIN_DEPT = B.MAIN_DEPT_CODE AND B.SUB_DEPT_CODE = '-' AND C.SUB_DEPT = '-') WHERE C.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FCM0041M SELECT #{id}, #{ePRTitle}, 116, SYSDATE, (SELECT USER_ID FROM SYS0047M WHERE HR_CODE = #{crtUsrNm} AND ROWNUM = 1), #{costCenterCode}, #{ePRRemark}, #{rciv}, #{add}, NULL, NULL FROM DUAL

SELECT FCM0043D_DELIVERY_DET_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FCM0043D SELECT #{delId}, #{id}, #{item}, #{quantity}, #{code}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{pic}, #{type}, #{region}, #{branch}, SYSDATE FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO FCM0045D SELECT #{id}, NVL((SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM FCM0045D WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{id}), 0) + 1, SYSDATE, #{crtUsr}, #{remark}, #{a}, NVL(#{newAssign}, #{a}), #{f}, NVL(#{rciv}, #{f}) FROM DUAL

SELECT FCM0042D_REQUEST_ITM_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FCM0042D SELECT #{subId}, #{id}, #{budgetCode}, TO_DATE(#{eta}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{item}, #{specs}, #{quantity}, #{uom}, #{remark} FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO FCM0044D SELECT #{id}, MEM_ID, #{seq}, 44, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL FROM ORG0001D WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
mapper.select: WITH FILES AS ( SELECT ATCH_FILE_NAME, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID FROM SYS0071D A JOIN SYS0070M B ON A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) SELECT A.REQUEST_ID, A.TITLE, A.STUS, A.COST_CENTER, D.COST_CENTER_TEXT, A.REMARK, F.ATCH_FILE_ID RCIV_ATCH_ID, F.ATCH_FILE_NAME RCIV_NAME, G.ATCH_FILE_ID ADD_ATCH_ID, G.ATCH_FILE_NAME ADD_NAME, C.BUDGET_CODE, C.BUDGET_CODE_TEXT, B.REQUEST_ITM_ID, B.ETA, B.ITEM, B.SPECS, B.QUANTITY, B.UOM, B.REMARK ITEM_REMARK, E.HR_CODE MEM_CODE, A.SUBMIT_DT, L.USER_NAME ASSIGNED_USER, K.FULL_NAME APPV_NAME, K.MEM_CODE APPV_MEM_CODE, J.SEQ APPV_SEQ, J.UPD_DT APPV_ACT_DT, J.REMARK APPV_REMARK, L.NAME APPV_STUS, M.NAME REQUEST_STUS, N.FULL_NAME REQST_NAME FROM FCM0041M A LEFT JOIN FCM0042D B ON A.REQUEST_ID = B.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN FCM0010M C ON B.BUDGET_CODE = C.BUDGET_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0008M D ON D.COST_CENTER = A.COST_CENTER JOIN SYS0047M E ON E.USER_ID = A.CRT_USER_ID LEFT JOIN FILES F ON F.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = RCIV_ATCH_ID LEFT JOIN FILES G ON G.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = ADD_ATCH_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D I ON I.MEM_ID = A.ASSIGN_USER LEFT JOIN FCM0044D J ON J.REQUEST_ID = A.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D K ON K.MEM_ID = J.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M L ON L.STUS_CODE_ID = J.STUS JOIN SYS0038M M ON M.STUS_CODE_ID = A.STUS JOIN ORG0001D N ON N.MEM_CODE = E.HR_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS0047M L ON L.HR_CODE = I.MEM_CODE WHERE A.REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
mapper.update: UPDATE FCM0041M SET STUS = 10 WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM, QUANTITY, CODE, ADDRESS, CONTACT, PIC, TYPE, REGION, BRANCH, CRT_DT FROM FCM0043D WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}

SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_CODE, A.FULL_NAME FROM ORG0001D A JOIN SYS0047M B ON A.MEM_CODE = B.HR_CODE JOIN SYS0098M C ON C.SUB_MODULE = 'PROCUREMENT' AND C.PARAM_CODE = 'FIN_APPV' AND C.PARAM_VAL = B.USER_NAME
SELECT MEM_ID FROM ( SELECT LAG(STUS) OVER (ORDER BY SEQ) PREV_STUS, STUS, MEM_ID FROM FCM0044D WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId} ) WHERE STUS = 44 AND (PREV_STUS IS NULL OR PREV_STUS <> 44)
SELECT MEM_ID, USER_NAME FROM SYS0047M A JOIN ORG0001D B ON B.MEM_CODE = A.HR_CODE WHERE MEM_CODE IN ('P0018', 'P2217', 'P2098', 'P2513', 'P2135')
